block.p: FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC., Coral Gables, Fla., one of the top producers and sellers of fresh fruit and vegetables, agreed to buy the Graziano Produce Co., Portland, Ore., a regional supplier of fresh-cut produce, to gain market share in the United States Pacific Northwest. The purchase price was undisclosed.

FRESH DEL MONTE PRODUCE INC., Coral Gables, Fla., one of the top producers and sellers of fresh fruit and vegetables, agreed to buy the Graziano Produce Co., Portland, Ore., a regional supplier of fresh-cut produce, to gain market share in the United States Pacific Northwest. The purchase price was undisclosed.

GENERAL ELECTRIC CO., Fairfield, Conn., which develops, makes and markets products of electricity, said a unit, GE Plastics, Pittsfield, Mass., bought closely held the Commercial Plastics and Supply Corp., Boca Raton, Fla., a plastics producer and distributor, for an undisclosed price to increase its distribution business.

TRIBUNE CO., Chicago, the third-largest newspaper publisher by circulation, said it might sell Times Mirror Magazines, publisher of Field & Stream, Popular Science and Golf, to management so it may focus on the company's television, newspaper and Internet businesses.

CALPINE CORP., San Jose, Calif., an independent power company, said it planned to build, own and operate a $350 million natural gas-powered cogeneration energy center at the chemical facility of BP Amoco P.L.C. in Decatur, Ala.
